title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image ('image1.jpg') into the layout again
EB: The expected result is that the new image is displayed
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Import the same 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
3. Observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
